name: SRDeviceUsageReport
desc: The frequency and relative duration that the user uses their device, particular Apple apps, or websites.

items.name: var duration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The duration that the report spans.

items.name: var totalScreenWakes: Int
items.desc: The total number of screen wakes for the device.

items.name: var totalUnlocks: Int
items.desc: The total number of unlocks for the device.

items.name: var totalUnlockDuration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The duration of time the device is in an unlocked state.

items.name: var applicationUsageByCategory: [SRDeviceUsageReport.CategoryKey : [SRDeviceUsageReport.ApplicationUsage]]
items.desc: The usage time of apps per category.

items.name: class SRDeviceUsageReport.ApplicationUsage
items.desc: An object that describes the user’s app activity over a period of time.

items.name: struct SRDeviceUsageReport.CategoryKey
items.desc: Categories of apps or websites that the user uses.

items.name: var notificationUsageByCategory: [SRDeviceUsageReport.CategoryKey : [SRDeviceUsageReport.NotificationUsage]]
items.desc: The frequency of notifications per category.

items.name: class SRDeviceUsageReport.NotificationUsage
items.desc: An object that describes notification frequency and the manner in which the user interacts with notifications.

items.name: var webUsageByCategory: [SRDeviceUsageReport.CategoryKey : [SRDeviceUsageReport.WebUsage]]
items.desc: The amount of time the user accesses domains per category.

items.name: class SRDeviceUsageReport.WebUsage
items.desc: An object that describes a user’s website usage.
